snippet: A court in Beijing sentenced a man to six years in prison after finding him guilty of detonating a homemade bomb in Beijing’s Capital International Airport in July, state-run news media reported.
abstract: Beijing court sentences Ji Zhongxing to six years in prison for detonating homemade bomb in Beijing's Capital International Airport in July; Ji had been trying to draw attention to his allegations that officials in city of Dongguan ignored his complaints that security officers there beat him so severely in 2005 that he was unable to walk.
lead_paragraph: A court in Beijing sentenced a man to six years in prison after finding him guilty of detonating a homemade bomb in Beijing’s Capital International Airport in July, state-run news media reported.

headline.main: China: 6-Year Term for Protester in Blast
headline.print_headline: China: 6-Year Term for Protester in Blast
